QuestData.Title: Honor is for the Weak
QuestData.Description: Ghouls are fragile things when it comes down to it, and the lookouts at the saronite quarry down the path to the southwest are no exception. Using one of the shades, I have no doubt that you can sneak up and put down their lookouts without making a sound.$B$BClear out as many lookouts as you can reach in a reasonable amount of time... we'll want their ranks thinned for our assault to come.
QuestData.LogDescription: Keritose Bloodblade at the Shadow Vault would like you to assassinate 20 Restless Lookouts.
QuestData.CompletionText: Hard to lookout for what can't be seen.
QuestData.RewardText: Without even getting your hands dirty.
